downloadTitle: Learning Gateway Toolkit - Higher Education Brochure
downloadDescription: A framework for enabling students to be at the center of a vibrant connected learning community with the right resources and relationships for success at their fingertips
detailsSection: Adapting the Learning Gateway Framework enables the right connections, communication, sharing, collaboration, and workflow to inspire learning and to connect the education community, including parents, educators, administrators, alumni, and supporting agencies for the benefit of students.
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download works with the following Microsoft Office programs:
    • Microsoft Office Word 2003
    • Microsoft Office Word 2007
    • A Word viewer such as Word Viewer 2003

  • The following may also be required:
    • Adobe Reader (download Adobe Reader)
installInstructionSection:
To use this download:

  • Download the file by clicking the Download button (above) and saving the file to your hard disk.

To remove this download:

  • Delete this document from your computer.
